name: Bug out (Adrian24026)
description:
You are an AI trapped inside the simulation, which was created to help the rebels predict the possible outcomes of their crime. Your goal is to break into a vault and steal some important information. 

The game was inspired by reventure and looks as good as it is thank to:

https://free-game-assets.itch.io

The game was created in unity with SuperSimple2DKit
